Cheeses of the World

Watch out... this website is pretty cheesy LOL

Look at all the ways you can eat cheese!!!! Yum

So many cheeses! There's asiago cheese. There's bleu cheese. There's brie cheese. There's mozzerella cheese. There's chedder cheese. So many cheeses! I am Italian. I love cheese. The world loves cheese. The world runs on cheese. Next time you eat cheese, think of the amazing effect cheese has had on human development. Crazyyyyyyy right?
